miniapp.name: PrimeCircle
miniapp.subtitle: Analyze your Farcaster follow network
miniapp.description: Evaluate the quality of creators you follow using Neynar scores and algorithmic metrics. Get insights into your network with tier-based classification (S/A/B/C/D) and quality scoring.
miniapp.ogDescription: Analyze the quality of your Farcaster follow network with Neynar scores and tier-based insights.
